mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.title, p.code, p.index, p.type, p.icon, p.remark, p.create_date, p.update_date,p.sort FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.id
